Game.Name: Disney's Aladdin II (SNES Capcom Port)
Game.Plot: Aladdin II is an unlicensed Sega Mega Drive (Genesis) game. It is an attempt at porting the SNES version of Aladdin (developed and published by Capcom) to Sega's console. Mega Drive consumers were not officially given Capcom's version of the game, but instead Virgin's version. Little is known about Aladdin II's origin.
